name: Entrust ECS AnyCA REST Gateway Plugin
description: Entrust ECS plugin for the AnyCA REST Gateway framework

ca_plugin_config.name: AuthUsername
ca_plugin_config.description: Username for the gateway to authenticate with Entrust

ca_plugin_config.name: AuthPassword
ca_plugin_config.description: Password for the account used to authenticate with Entrust

ca_plugin_config.name: ClientCertificate
ca_plugin_config.description: The client certificate information used to authenticate with Entrust, only if configured to use certificate authentication

ca_plugin_config.name: IgnoreExpired
ca_plugin_config.description: If set to true, will not sync expired certs from Entrust

ca_plugin_config.name: Enabled
ca_plugin_config.description: Flag to Enable or Disable gateway functionality. Disabling is primarily used to allow creation of the CA prior to configuration information being available.

enrollment_config.name: LifetimeMonths
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The number of months of validity to use when requesting certs. If not provided, default is 12.

enrollment_config.name: Organization
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: For requests that will not have a subject (such as ACME) you can use this field to provide an organization name. Value supplied here will override any CSR values, so do not include this field if you want the organization from the CSR to be used.

enrollment_config.name: CertificateUsage
enrollment_config.description: Required for public SSL certificate types. Represents the key usage for the certificates enrolled against this template. Valid values are 'server', 'client', or 'serverclient'. Do not provide a value for cert types that are not public SSL.

enrollment_config.name: RenewalWindowDays
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The number of days from certificate expiration that the gateway should do a renewal rather than a reissue. If not provided, default is 90.
